data.title: 2024 Ram ProMaster® Cargo Van
data.meta_description: Discover the 2024 Ram ProMaster® work van. Explore the available Super High Roof Van, cargo length options & more on this Ram van here today.
data.text:
Ram Brand commercial vehicles are built to serve your business. Use the Ram Professional Work Truck Locator to search for Ram Brand trucks and vans in stock near you that fit your business needs.

Ram ProMaster® has the tallest and widest standard cargo area in its class. Get the space you need to stay ready for the next challenge with three available cargo height options, including the Super High Roof Van and its 86-inch cargo height (shown), four available cargo length options and a wide selection of available upfits from aftermarket upfitters.

Power through the day. Ram ProMaster® has unsurpassed standard V6 276 horsepower with the 3.6L Pentastar® V6 engine. The 2024 Ram ProMaster® has Class-Exclusive front-wheel drive and an electronic park brake, which have fewer mechanical components, resulting in less maintenance and more time getting work done.

Make the right first impression with the 2024 Ram ProMaster® equipped with one of three new equipment packages, Tradesman®, SLT or SLT+. Working in frigid conditions? Go for the newly available Cold Weather Group, which includes a heated steering wheel and a heated windshield. And confidently commute to and from jobs with the Most Advanced Ram ProMaster Ever Made in a high-tech cabin, bolstered by available infotainment and seating.

The available Crew Van Package allows up to six total people to come along for the ride and includes a comfortable bench seat for three passengers. It comes with three available cargo options with 6 feet, 7 feet or 9 feet of cargo space behind a partition. And, there’s space under the rear seat, allowing for loading of long items up to 13 feet in length and 6 inches in height.

With great business-focused features and benefits like expedited service, and complimentary shuttles, included with the BusinessLink program, owners can help improve their businesses as preferred commercial customers.
